service.title: Returning Values from Forms: multipart/form-data
service.documentation: This specification defines an Internet Media Type, multipart/form-data, which can be used by a wide variety of applications and transported by a wide variety of protocols as a way of returning a set of values as the result of a user filling out a form.

media-type.documentation: The media-type multipart/form-data follows the rules of all multipart MIME data streams as outlined in RFC 2046. In forms, there are a series of fields to be supplied by the user who fills out the form. Each field has a name. Within a given form, the names are unique.
